title: Favorite letterforms
content:
I am doing a type exploration at the moment looking for stunning individual letterforms. I'm looking for the best 'A' 'R' 'T', could be caps or lowercase and doesn't have to be the same face, just beautiful and interesting. I know it's a bit subjective and vague, just interested to see what people come up with. It's for a poster.

Cheers for any suggestions  
Rob
author: Rob Sutton

comments.content:
A - Futura, Adobe Garamond, Akizidenz-Grotesk  
R - Unit, Papyrus  
T - Akzidenz-Grotesk, Armor Piercing

a- Thesis family, Frutiger, Helvetica  
R- Frutiger, Univers  
ART- Univers Bold Condensed

Every capital letter looks great in Univers Bold Condensed.

ART - Glasgow  
a - Albertus  
r - Present  
t - ITC Tiepolo

Thanks everyone, I'll take those on board and work eith them.

Rob
